AUCTION_CREATION_QUANTITY_REQUIRED: The value must be filled and greater than 0
AUCTION_CREATION_INITIAL_BID_REQUIRED: The value must be filled and greater than 0
AUCTION_WIDGET_AUCTION_BID_ERROR_MIN: You can't place a bid with value lesser than {{ min }}
AUCTION_ERROR_CREATE_AUCTION_NO_ITEM: You don't have the item you're trying to create the auction
AUCTION_ERROR_CREATE_AUCTION_INSUFFICIEN: You don't have enough item quantity to create this auction
AUCTION_ERROR_PLACE_BID_AUCTION_NOT_FOUN: Auction not found or already finished
AUCTION_ERROR_PLACE_BID_OWN_AUCTION: You can't place a bid on your own auction
AUCTION_ERROR_PLACE_BID_LESSER_INITIAL_B: The value selected is lesser than initial bid
AUCTION_ERROR_PLACE_BID_LESSER_WINNING_B: The value selected is lesser than or equal to current bid
